FUNC.NAME: microQr
FUNC.SYNOPSIS: is used to enable or disable the microqr decoder.

EXAMPLE.DESC: The following example enables the scanner to read only microqr labels:
EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="allDecoders:disabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="microqr:enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="enabled">

EXAMPLE.DESC: Above example can also be written as shown below:

EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-all_decoders" Content="disabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-microqr" Content="enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-enabled" Content="SCN1">

ADDITIONAL.APPLIES: Transient - Decoder settings are only guaranteed to persist until the Scanner is disabled
ADDITIONAL.REQ: Scanner or Imager module and device that supports MicroQR.
